title: Lies & the Lying Liars Who Tell Them: A Fair & Balanced Look at the Right
description: The author of Rush Limbaugh Is a Big Fat Idiot and Other Observations offers a whimsical critique of the Right, challenging conceptions about the media's liberal bias, exposing the party's deceptive practices, and identifying inconsistencies in the Bush administration. 200,000 first printing.
author: Al Franken
